choice.title: Plugins
choice.tooltip: The Space Navigator Plugin for BALLView
choice.description: This plugin allows to use the 3DConnexion Space Navigator devices for controlling BALLView. Please make sure that the driver is installed correctly before activating the plugin. To start the plugin, choose "Tools->Load Plugin", click on the SpaceNavigator entry and hit "activate".
